Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay”

Reviews.Content: stayed twin 3 nights march 2012 delighted hotel clean beds comfortable quiet location road cafes paris short walk siene notre dame etc staff friendly hesitate stay highly recommend

Reviews.Content: wife stayed week october 2011 hadnt paris 25 city happier clean comfortable quiet bathroom expected am pretty tall 63 shower adapter reach wet hair ducking breakfast 12 euros pp found skip nearby cafes ambiance cafes beat location location location perfect walking close metro 5 minute walk rer line luxembourg gardens 10 minute walk actually cancelled van airport realized easy cheap train luxembourg gardens train station front desk helpful reservations wildly knowledgable regarding suggestions help coordinate plans suggest eat tours sightseeing etc pleasant willing help definitely stay location issue bathroom

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in an unbeatable location”
Reviews.Author: Anne C
Reviews.Content: cute nice clean quiet stayed 12 nights loved staff helpful spoke adequate english didnt breakfast local wonderful bakery gerald mulot stay near rer line char degaulle airport costs 10 euros

Reviews.Title: “Excellent for exploring artistic Paris”
Reviews.Author: Anya_Ukr
Reviews.Content: cosy quiet clean hotel convenient location steps luxembourg gardens blvd st germain 10 min walk notre dam rive gauche centre pompidou museum dorsay louvre nice bistros patisseries restaurants literally doors ive stayed 2 nights single 3rd floor single bed clean convenient perfect short stay staff hotel helpful downside wifi free

Reviews.Title: “The real thing”
Reviews.Author: traveling_grandmothe
Reviews.Content: stay grand hotel des balcons truly parisian experience mme andre staff provided spacious spotlessly clean beautifully decorated appreciated double closets double sinks wonderful duvet covers safe valuables hairdryer breakfast bountiful delicious people coming mme andre marie staff authentic experiences paris versions consulted weather train schedules help giverny loveliest day earliest train reservations favorite nearby restaurants encouraged speak french corrected accents gardens du return budget allows wouldnt staying elsewhere family run hotel willing treat guests family

Reviews.Content: grand hotel des balcons location pleasant helpful staff time stayed price night reasonable clean shower curtain shower odd quaint breakfasts incredible recommend hotel

Reviews.Content: found perfect stop europe close forms transit restaurants cafes grocery store luxembourg gardens lovely november amazing clean comfortable bathroom simple job didnt buy breakfast found cafes close stopped grocery croissants coffee starbucks sat park price cheap central paris value lobby lovely welcoming

Reviews.Title: “Pas mal”

Reviews.Content: internet deal 90 euros night single steps luxembourg gardens yes faced inner court quiet clean linens towels remember 2 star hotel service staff top rate delightful dont air conditioned am wifi available charge hour day excellent bath modern deep tubshower

Reviews.Title: “Avoid rooms adjacent to dumb waiter”
Reviews.Author: globegal
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 star hotel expectations low pleasantly surprised hotel clean albeit except shower curtain internet beautifully able calll home night via skype complaint 107 located adjacent dumb waiter promptly started running 6 am day rising day avoid adjacent dumb waiter

Reviews.Title: “Comme si, comme ça...”
Reviews.Author: slquebec
Reviews.Content: reading stellar reviews travellers disappointed hotel starters advertise wifi dont pay tacky day age decent size paris location alas street noise night distressing drunk students paraded endlessly street midnight 4 am moreover hotel guests illmannered managements fault walls paper thin disturbed couple fought hour 11 pm midnight guests spoke loudly corridors hours night classy reception lukewarm breakfast expensive

Reviews.Content: husband chose hotel friend recommended location price suited little longawaited ten day vacation paris bring hours checking husband fell flight concrete stairs tabac rushed ambulance hospital remained duration trip spotless charming home friends exactly hotel provided owner staff help comfort maps directions names owner provided night day hospital woman desk provided bowl cereal climb bed dinner couldnt wished warmer comfortable environment journey world international medicine read amenities hotel reviews review port storm thoughtfulness care extraordinary husband return hopefully paris retirement stay time

Reviews.Title: “Clean, well located and inexpensive”
Reviews.Author: Oliviamack
Reviews.Content: stayed june pleased dont expect ritz carlton hundred euros night paris pretty perfect shower tiny complaint beds clean sheets warm comforters balcony window closet hangers breakfast thats served 7 am 9am pretty decent coffee anthony bourdain shooting segment restaurant block food cafes sit food wine odeon metro station close

Reviews.Title: “Charming Hotel, Charming Staff”
Reviews.Author: murraymanCornwall
Reviews.Content: returned grand hotel de balcons yesterday 7 night stay recommend situation excellent close attractions hotel spotless super comfortable staff owner warm friendly charming fault partake breakfast choosing pavement cafe instead smelt delicious definately returning hopefully soon

Reviews.Title: “Fabulous find”
Reviews.Author: AMdsgn
Reviews.Content: location quiet street close luxembourg gardens metro youre taking train cdg airport city hotel easy walk luxembourg stop beds comfortable beds clean offered storage space staff helpful friendly breakfast buffet offered variety hot cold foods gem

Reviews.Title: “Superb Location- Excellent Value”
Reviews.Author: EastCoastTravelers30
Reviews.Content: clean comfortable perfect location definitely im bit late posting review ive joined trip advisor site helpful assisting hotel add review luxury isnt spot lovely stay

Reviews.Title: “We will be Back Again”
Reviews.Author: medic63TulskIreland
Reviews.Content: 9th visit paris idea expect hotel choose mainly observations whilst trip advisor reviews yes hotel excelled cleanliness despite previous review breakfeast found experienced 9 wife coeliac unfortunately brought own bread trouble staff arranged owner buck wheat crackers available day 4 facilities bars restaurants lounge look hotel feel welcome appreciated grand hotel des balcons delivers compromise break tradition return john clark ireland
